name: Dance with Prince
description:
NEW BUILD UUUUUUUUUP!

To honor Prince's recent passing, we wanted to make this little game to remind ourselves and everyone else of him.

This is 3 solid days of work and we managed to get a nice little alpha build out! If you find errors, please say so! Currently, this is only available on Windows, but we'll have Mac and Linux builds out for the final game!

If you like the game, please donate to help us fund our flagship title, reSyNCh, the main character for which is present in this game!
